card_titles: Aerospace & Defense || Medical and Industrial || Digital Displays || Cable & Harnesses || Instrument Panels & Lighting || Precision Machining & Fabrication || Box Build Assembly || Electro-Mechanical and PCB Assembly || Repair Services || Engineering
card_descriptions:
Aerospace & Defense

High-reliability displays, panels, and integrated electronic sub-assemblies for flight, mission, and training systems. ||

Medical and Industrial

High mix to high volume displays, integrated electro-mechanical & pcb assemblies, and precision machining for medical devices and industrial systems. ||

Digital Displays

Class 100 and Class 1000 clean rooms for digital display manufacturing ||

Cable & Harnesses

In-house IPC-A-610, IPC/WHMA-A-620, and IPC J-STD-001 certified technicians ||

Instrument Panels & Lighting

QPL-7788 certified and NVIS compliant illuminated panels, lighting, and keypads / bezels ||

Precision Machining & Fabrication

5-axis CNC machining with Â±0.001" tolerance capability for bezels, enclosures, and mechanical parts ||

Box Build Assembly

Complete sub-assemblies with full integration testing and environmental qualification ||

Electro-Mechanical and PCB Assembly

Multi-disciplinary sub-assemblies combining displays, electronics, and precision mechanical components with full traceability ||

Repair Services

MRO refurbishment or overhaul for various parts with FAA 145 certified airworthiness support (if applicable) ||

Engineering

Design and prototyping expertise for manufacturability, qualification testing, and production transition
cta_descriptions: Share your requirements. Our engineering team can confirm fit and provide budgetary guidance.
